jobs.title: Data Analyst
jobs.description: We are in need of a Data Analyst to interpret data, analyze results using statistical techniques, and provide ongoing reports to support our business decisions.
jobs.responsibilities:
Proven experience as a Data Analyst or similar role
Strong knowledge of SQL and Excel
Experience with data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI)
Analytical mind and problem-solving aptitude
jobs.requirements:
Proven experience as a Data Analyst or similar role
Strong knowledge of SQL and Excel
Experience with data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI)
Analytical mind and problem-solving aptitude

jobs.title: Marketing Specialist
jobs.description: Join our marketing team as a Marketing Specialist to develop and execute effective marketing strategies, increase brand awareness, and drive customer engagement.
jobs.responsibilities:
Create and implement marketing campaigns and strategies
Analyze market trends and customer behavior to identify opportunities
Manage social media accounts and digital marketing efforts
Collaborate with the sales team to support promotional activities
jobs.requirements:
Proven experience as a Marketing Specialist or similar role
Strong understanding of digital marketing tools and techniques
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Ability to analyze data and generate actionable insights
